summary: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex, until they run into each other. Let the games begin.
cast: Son Ye-jin|Il-guk Song|Sun-yeong Ahn|Bo-ra Geum|Seong-cheol Ha|Hyeon-yeong|Seong-il Jeong|Sang-ryeol Ji|Mae-ri Lee|Ju-hyeon No|Jun Gyu Park|Yong-woo Park|Yeong-sik Song|Hyeon Woo
title: Jakeob-ui jeongseok
